other_tests.findings: Current count is 440 cells/µL; nadir was 140 cells/µL in 1991.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The CD4 T-lymphocyte count has improved from the nadir of 140 cells/µL to 440 cells/µL.

other_tests.findings: Plasma HIV RNA level has been undetectable since 1996.
Mr H takes 9 medications including 4 antiretrovirals, 2 lipid-lowering agents, testosterone, an antidepressant, and an anxiolytic.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Rosuvastatin was discontinued and he was switched to a single-tablet regimen (emtricitabine/tenofovir/rilpivirine), but due to increased depressive symptoms, he was switched back to his previous regimen.
